name: ReMind (jameswood)
description:
SUMMARY

You, the protagonist, begin your journey in this nightmare-like place. A place that looks familiar and strange at the same time to you. You must explore the place, resolve the puzzles presented to you and, AVOID AT ALL COSTS, being caught by the terrible enemies that lurk the place, looking forward to kill you.

Surpass all the difficulties, unwrap your tangled memories, and discover the truth from your past and why are you here. Maybe the response will surprise you.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Right & Left Click - Interact

Number 4 - Lighter

Developed By Grandpah Studios
  • Daniel Barrera
  • Jesús Borrero
  • Martín Fuentes
  • Sergio Mancilla
  • Santiago Palmet

This is a short demo. The complete game (maybe) will be avaliable in the future, when the developers have time. Only for Windows computer.
